<Section size="2">

# Theme

Control your app's visual appearance with seven configuration options. Kookie UI Theme is a fork of [Radix Themes](https://www.radix-ui.com/themes), offering the same foundation with custom enhancements for theming and accessibility.

<CodeBlock buttonsPosition="center">

```tsx
import { Theme } from '@kushagradhawan/kookie-ui';
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

<Section size="2">

## Appearance

Set `appearance` to control light, dark, or system preference mode.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
// Light mode
<Theme appearance="light">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
// Dark mode
<Theme appearance="dark">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
// System preference (default)
<Theme appearance="inherit">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Accent Color

Use `accentColor` to set the primary color for interactive elements.

Available colors: `gray`, `gold`, `bronze`, `brown`, `yellow`, `amber`, `orange`, `tomato`, `red`, `ruby`, `crimson`, `pink`, `plum`, `purple`, `violet`, `iris`, `indigo`, `blue`, `cyan`, `teal`, `jade`, `green`, `grass`, `lime`, `mint`, `sky`.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
<Theme accentColor="blue">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Gray Color

Use `grayColor` to set the neutral gray scale for backgrounds and text.

Available grays: `auto`, `gray`, `mauve`, `slate`, `sage`, `olive`, `sand`.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
<Theme grayColor="slate">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Material

Set `material` to control panel transparency for depth and visual separation.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
// Solid backgrounds
<Theme material="solid">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
// Translucent backgrounds (default)
<Theme material="translucent">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Radius

Set `radius` to control the global corner radius scale for all components.

Available values: `none`, `small`, `medium` (default), `large`, `full`.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
<Theme radius="medium">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Scaling

Set `scaling` to control the global size scale for UI density.

Available values: `90%`, `95%`, `100%` (default), `105%`, `110%`.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
<Theme scaling="100%">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Font Family

Set `fontFamily` to control the typography system for your app.

Available values: `sans` (default), `mono`, `serif`.

<CodeBlock>

```tsx
<Theme fontFamily="sans">
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>

<Section size="2">

## Enhancements

Kookie UI extends Radix Themes with practical improvements:

- **Material**: Use `material` instead of `panelBackground` for intuitive panel transparency control. Existing `panelBackground` usage works with migration warnings. All panels automatically respect your material setting.

- **Effects**: Extended blur tokens provide 12-step blur scale for precise backdrop effects. Granular opacity offers 9-step opacity scale for fine-tuned transparency. Specialized 3D button effects create realistic depth and elevation.

- **Typography**: Pre-configured Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts with proper fallbacks prevent browser font weight synthesis issues. Graceful degradation falls back to system fonts if custom fonts fail.

</Section>



<Section size="2">

## Tokens

Use CSS custom properties to access theme values in your styles:

<CodeBlock>

```css
/* Color tokens */
var(--accent-9)           /* Primary accent color */
var(--gray-11)            /* High contrast text */
```

</CodeBlock>

<CodeBlock>

```css
/* Layout tokens */
var(--space-4)            /* Standard spacing */
var(--radius-3)           /* Component border radius */
```

</CodeBlock>

</Section>
